creator: Snash UG  (haftungsbeschränkt)
descriptionHtml:
Looking for hot stuff and some escalations at pre-drinking already? Drinkflix will give it to you!

Go and get your glasses, fill them up and let Drinkflix do the rest! With funny tasks, mad courage tests and super hot body contact. „Uhlala“. This ultimate drinking game app brings fun for each and everyone!

No matter if you’re at a house party, in a bar or outdoor - this drinking game will give you what you need:

- cool design
- more than 3000 cards
- hot challenges
- Never have I ever games
- funny rules
- Truth or Dare
- up to 30 players
- you can start the game right away
- regular updates with new cards
- perfect pre-gaming is bound to occur

Got any ideas for new cards? You can send them in and become a part of our game!
We’re a small booze loving team, we love to party and play games. Try out Drinkflix and please give us a feedback, if you want to help supporting us! We are doing our best to make this drinking game the best in the world, so let’s play!

Have fun & Cheers!
descriptionShort: Drinkflix stands for amazing partys, pre-drinking fun and boozing with friends!
title: Drinkflix - drinking game for party and boozing

title: Drinkflix - drinking game for party and boozing

creator: Snash Game Studio
descriptionHtml:
Drinkflix - the ultimate party game 2020

Type in your names, category and let’s go: pre-gaming, boozing and partying
hard. Drinkflix is the new drinking game for each and every occasion and will always give you
exactly what you’re looking for: Hot challenges and a lot of fun!

This game is about way more than just getting completely smashed without any reasons!

Differentcard types with different challenges are awaiting you. We’ve got funny games like eye gazing battles, floor is lava and bottle flip challenges. As well as fast quiz challenges or funny theme-
rounds.

Losers drink, winners distribute shots. Just like it’s supposed to be with good drinking games!
Here is what you get:
- More than 3000 cards ... and more coming every day!
- challenge cards, cheers cards, truth battles, theme games and crazy rules
- many different categories like classic, 18+, Never have I ever, city country and bad liver
as well as carnival and outdoor fun.
- send us your own ideas for new cards and become legendary!
- the perfect app for amazing parties, pre-gaming and boozing with friends

Forget all the drinking games you knew like spin the bottle, truth or dare, never have I ever and all
the others! Get Drinkflix today and have all the games in one app! We promise!
Have fun getting drunk! Cheers!
